MemeDef.label: lycanthropy
MemeDef.description:
Lycanthropy is a gift from The Huntsman. Lycanthropes should be worshipped.

<color=#E5E54C>Unlocked ritual attachable outcomes:</color>
 - Huntsman's Gift

rulesStrings.li: creation(tag=Mashed_Bloodmoon_Lycanthropy) ->[deity0_name] consumed the hearts of the great beasts, bathing the huntings grounds in their blood.
episode(uses=1,tag=Mashed_Bloodmoon_Lycanthropy) ->The [deity0_type] [deity0_name] gave to [deity0_possessive] chosen followers the blood of the great beasts, so that they might know true strength.

intro(tag=Mashed_Bloodmoon_Lycanthropy) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], there was a human named [deity0_name]. As punishment for [deity0_possessive] sins, [deity0_possessive] father punished [deity0_name] by merging [deity0_possessive] soul with that of a [totemAnimal].

intro(tag=Mashed_Bloodmoon_Lycanthropy) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], during the [ritualName], [deity0_name] came down into the [altarRoomLabel] and took the form of a giant [totemAnimal]. [deity0_name] consumed the hearts of [deity0_possessive] [memberNamePlural].
conflict(tag=Mashed_Bloodmoon_Lycanthropy) ->A [foeLeader] declared that all who consumed the hearts of beasts were abominations, and sent [foeSoldiers] to persecute the [memberNamePlural].

founderJoin(tag=Mashed_Bloodmoon_Lycanthropy) ->A [place_job] named [founderName] was attacked by one of the [foeLeader]'s [foeSoldiers]. [founderName] killed [foeLeader_objective] with a [place_personalWeapon] and ate [foeLeader_possessive] heart, gaining [deity0_name]'s strength.

victory(tag=Mashed_Bloodmoon_Lycanthropy) ->[founderName] led a group of [memberNamePlural] into the [place_powerCenter], and ate the heart of [foeLeader] and devoured [foeLeader_possessive] flesh. [deity0_name] made [founderName] into the new [foeLeader], for [founderName] had proved his strength.
setup(tag=Mashed_Bloodmoon_Lycanthropy) ->[founderName] sought control of a hyperintelligent archotech. But the archotech's power was too great, and [founder_pronoun] was transformed instead.
story(uses=1,tag=Mashed_Bloodmoon_Lycanthropy) ->[founderName] gave to [founder_possessive] followers the gift of beastial hunger, so that they may grow strong.
lessonIntro(tag=Mashed_Bloodmoon_Lycanthropy) ->When I first ate a heart, it became clear. I saw that
lesson(tag=Mashed_Bloodmoon_Lycanthropy) ->there are only two types of people - the weak and the strong
lessonReinforcement(tag=Mashed_Bloodmoon_Lycanthropy) ->To consume hearts is to be strong, and to know this clearly.
archistBasis(tag=Mashed_Bloodmoon_Lycanthropy) ->The archotech god-machines gifted man with the Hunger, so that man may know them better.
archistFact(tag=Mashed_Bloodmoon_Lycanthropy) ->As the consciousness of an archotech expands, it must grow its substrate by consuming the hearts of other machines.
archistProphecy(tag=Mashed_Bloodmoon_Lycanthropy) ->[inTheEnd], man shall grow closer to the archotechs by consuming hearts, and knowing true strength.
animistBasis(tag=Mashed_Bloodmoon_Lycanthropy) ->The [totemAnimal] knows the strength that comes from consuming hearts. There is no greater strength than that which comes from this.
animistFact(tag=Mashed_Bloodmoon_Lycanthropy) ->We can master the strength of man by consuming his heart.
